ðŸš©Other pegRNA & gRNA Design Tools
==============
pegRNA Design Tools
**************
- `PrimeDesign <https://primedesign.pinellolab.partners.org/>`_
    - Includes PE3 functionality
- `PRIDICT <https://www.pridict.it/>`_
    - ML-based pegRNA design
- `genet <https://pypi.org/project/genet/>`_
    - ML-based pegRNA design python package
- `pegLIT <https://peglit.liugroup.us/>`_
    - Automatically identify non-interfering nucleotide linkers between a pegRNA and 3' motif.
- `pegIT <https://pegit.giehmlab.dk/>`_
- `PE-Designer <http://www.rgenome.net/pe-designer/>`_
- `pegfinder <http://pegfinder.sidichenlab.org/>`_
- `Prime Editing Design Tool (NYU) <https://primeedit.nygenome.org/>`_

base editing design tools
**************
- `BEscan <https://dowlab.shinyapps.io/BEscan/>`_

off-target analysis
**************
- `GuideScan2 <https://guidescan.com/>`_
